item.title: Goldman says buy these 'insensitive' stocks that aren't driven by trade and big macro factors
item.description: There is a variety of stocks investors can use to try and insulate themselves from volatility, according to Goldman Sachs.

item.title: Biggest winners and losers of the first quarter from CVS to Tesla
item.description: Many stocks that underperformed in the first quarter of the year belonged to the technology sector.

item.title: The charts suggest more losses ahead for Japan stocks and this popular ETF, according to Katie Stockton
item.description: The chart analyst breaks down the action in the Nikkei 225 index and the 'EWJ' ETF.

item.title: Google could end up like Eastman Kodak if it doesn't adapt search biz for AI, says tech analyst Reitzes
item.description: OpenAI's home page can act as the "digital camera" for Alphabet, he said.

item.title: The essential metric every options trader must know and how to use it this week
item.description: Mike Khouw goes over what 'delta' is and how to craft a trade in it this week.
